description: Describes the principals (service consumers) that are permitted to discover your VPC endpoint service. Principal ARNs with path components aren't supported.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: The filters. principal - The ARN of the principal. principal-type - The principal type ( All | Service | OrganizationUnit | Account | User | Role). (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Principal
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal.

nested_items.name: ServicePermissionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the service permission.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
